ModMetaData.name: Rain Caller
ModMetaData.author: zzz
ModMetaData.description:
Add one-use item that change weather to rain when used.
Craftable at Machining table, cost 50 Steel and 1 Component.
No research needed.
Don't require a new game.
To remove from existing game make sure to delete the Bill from Machining table before remove mod.
